chu.engine.anim

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • chu.engine.anim.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BattlePreview.CirclingSprite

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a set of animations, and allows the user to switch between animations.
    Author:
    Shawn

    • Method Detail

      • addAnimation

        public void addAnimation(java.lang.String name,
                         org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture tex,
                         int width,
                         int height,
                         int length,
                         int columns,
                         float f)
        Add a new animation to the sprite by creating an animation with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the animation
        tex - Texture to use as the spritesheet
        width - Width of a single frame in pixels
        height - Height of a single frame in pixels
        length - the length
        columns - the columns
        f - Speed of the animation in frames per second

      • addAnimation

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the animation
        tex - Texture to use as the static image
